book.title: 歪歪学校有点奇怪 Wayside School Gets a Little Stranger
book.description: 简介： All the kids from Wayside School had to spend 243 days in horrible schools while Wayside was closed to get rid of the cows {Don't ask!). Now the kids are back and the fun begins again on every floor....
